meanings.definition: The act of thickening or becoming thicker.
meanings.sent1: The inspissation of the pudding made it difficult to pour.
meanings.sent2: After the inspissation of the sauce, it became rich and creamy.
meanings.sent3: The inspissation of the paint turned it into a gooey mess.
meanings.sent4: His inspissation of emotions made it hard for him to express himself.
meanings.sent5: The inspissation of the fog obscured the view completely.

meanings.definition: The process of making something thicker or more concentrated.
meanings.sent1: The inspissation of the syrup created a sticky mess on the counter.
meanings.sent2: During the inspissation of the solution, it changed from a liquid to a gel.
meanings.sent3: The inspissation of the traffic jam caused chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent4: The inspissation of thoughts in his mind made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The inspissation of the plot in the story added depth and complexity.
